titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Special Committee on Aging.

action.text: Special Committee on Aging. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Kohl. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 2/12/2009--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Special Committee on Aging for the 111th Congress.
